member.name: T:MistralSDK.Abstractions.IMistralClient
member.summary: Defines the contract for a Mistral AI API client. This interface enables dependency injection and unit testing with mocks.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.Abstractions.IMistralClient.ChatCompletionAsync(MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sends a chat completion request to the Mistral AI API.
member.param: The chat completion request containing the model, messages, and parameters.
A cancellation token to cancel the operation.
member.returns: A object containing the API response or error information.
member.exception: Thrown when the request is null.
Thrown when the API returns an error.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.Abstractions.IMistralClient.ValidateRequest(MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest)
member.summary: Validates a chat completion request without sending it to the API.
member.returns: A validation result indicating whether the request is valid.

member.name: T:MistralSDK.Abstractions.ValidationResult
member.summary: Represents the result of a validation operation.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.Abstractions.ValidationResult.IsValid
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the validation passed.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.Abstractions.ValidationResult.Errors
member.summary: Gets the collection of validation errors, if any.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.Abstractions.ValidationResult.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList{System.String})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.Abstractions.ValidationResult.Success
member.summary: Creates a successful validation result.
member.returns: A successful validation result.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.Abstractions.ValidationResult.Failure(System.String[])
member.summary: Creates a failed validation result with the specified errors.
member.returns: A failed validation result.

member.name: T:MistralSDK.Caching.IChatCompletionCache
member.summary: Defines the contract for caching chat completion responses.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.Caching.IChatCompletionCache.GetAsync(MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Attempts to get a cached response for the given request.
member.returns: The cached response, or null if not found.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.Caching.IChatCompletionCache.SetAsync(MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest,MistralSDK.MistralResponse,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Stores a response in the cache.
member.param: The chat completion request (used as the key).

member.name: M:MistralSDK.Caching.IChatCompletionCache.Clear
member.summary: Removes all cached entries.

member.name: T:MistralSDK.Caching.MemoryChatCompletionCache
member.summary: In-memory implementation of the chat completion cache. Uses for storage.

remarks.para: This cache is useful for reducing API calls for identical requests. It is particularly effective for: - Repeated queries with the same parameters - Development and testing scenarios - Low-latency requirements where cache hits are acceptable
Note: Caching is only appropriate when the same input should produce the same output. For creative or varied responses (high temperature), caching may not be desirable.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.Caching.MemoryChatCompletionCache.#ctor(MistralSDK.Configuration.MistralClientOptions)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance with the specified options.
member.param: The client options containing cache configuration.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.Caching.MemoryChatCompletionCache.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Options.IOptions{MistralSDK.Configuration.MistralClientOptions})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance with the specified options (IOptions pattern).

member.name: M:MistralSDK.Caching.MemoryChatCompletionCache.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory.IMemoryCache,MistralSDK.Configuration.MistralClientOptions)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance with an existing cache and options.
member.param: The client options containing cache configuration.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.Caching.MemoryChatCompletionCache.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory.IMemoryCache,Microsoft.Extensions.Options.IOptions{MistralSDK.Configuration.MistralClientOptions})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance with an existing cache and options (IOptions pattern).

member.name: M:MistralSDK.Caching.MemoryChatCompletionCache.GenerateCacheKey(MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest)
member.summary: Generates a cache key based on the request parameters.
member.returns: A unique cache key for the request.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.Caching.MemoryChatCompletionCache.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: True to release both managed and unmanaged resources.

member.name: T:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionErrorModelResponse
member.summary: Represents a model-specific error response from the Mistral AI API. This is typically returned when there are issues with the model itself or model-specific parameters.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionErrorModelResponse.Object
member.summary: Gets or sets the object type. Always "error" for error responses.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionErrorModelResponse.Message
member.summary: Gets or sets the error message describing what went wrong.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionErrorModelResponse.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of error that occurred. Common values include: "invalid_request_error", "authentication_error", "rate_limit_error", "server_error".

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionErrorModelResponse.Param
member.summary: Gets or sets the parameter that caused the error (if applicable). This can be any object type depending on the error context.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionErrorModelResponse.Code
member.summary: Gets or sets the error code for programmatic error handling.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionErrorModelResponse.Details
member.summary: Gets or sets additional error details (if available).

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionErrorModelResponse.Status
member.summary: Gets or sets the HTTP status code associated with this error.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionErrorModelResponse.GetUserFriendlyMessage
member.summary: Gets a user-friendly error message.
member.returns: A formatted error message suitable for display to users.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionErrorModelResponse.IsRetryable
member.summary: Determines if this is a retryable error.
member.returns: True if the error is retryable; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionErrorModelResponse.GetRetryDelaySeconds
member.summary: Gets the recommended retry delay in seconds.
member.returns: The recommended delay before retrying, or null if not retryable.

member.name: T:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest
member.summary: Represents a request for chat completion from the Mistral AI API.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest.Model
member.summary: Gets or sets the model identifier to use for the completion. Required field that specifies which Mistral model to use.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest.Temperature
member.summary: Gets or sets the temperature parameter for controlling randomness in the response. Values range from 0.0 (deterministic) to 2.0 (very random). Default value is 0.7.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest.TopP
member.summary: Gets or sets the top-p parameter for nucleus sampling. Controls diversity by considering only the most likely tokens. Values range from 0.0 to 1.0. Default value is 1.0.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest.MaxTokens
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of tokens to generate in the response. If not specified, the model will generate until it reaches a natural stopping point.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest.Messages
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of messages in the conversation. Required field that contains the conversation history and current prompt.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest.PromptMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the prompt mode for the request. Optional parameter that can be used to specify special prompt handling.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest.SafePrompt
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to enable safe prompt mode. When enabled, the API will apply additional safety filters. Default value is false.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest.RandomSeed
member.summary: Gets or sets the random seed for reproducible results. When set, the model will generate consistent results for the same input.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest.Stream
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to stream the response. When true, the response will be streamed token by token. Default value is false.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest.IsValid
member.summary: Validates the request parameters.
member.returns: True if the request is valid; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.MessageRequest
member.summary: Represents a message in a chat conversation.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.MessageRequest.Role
member.summary: Gets or sets the role of the message sender. Valid values are: "system", "user", "assistant".

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.MessageRequest.Content
member.summary: Gets or sets the content of the message. Required field that contains the actual text of the message.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.MessageRequest.IsValid
member.summary: Validates the message parameters.
member.returns: True if the message is valid; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.MessageRequest.IsValidRole(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the role is valid.
member.returns: True if the role is valid; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.MistralModels
member.summary: Provides constants for commonly used model names.

member.name: F:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.MistralModels.Tiny
member.summary: Mistral Tiny model - fastest and most cost-effective.

member.name: F:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.MistralModels.Small
member.summary: Mistral Small model - good balance of speed and quality.

member.name: F:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.MistralModels.Medium
member.summary: Mistral Medium model - high quality with good performance.

member.name: F:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.MistralModels.Large
member.summary: Mistral Large model - highest quality, best for complex tasks.

member.name: T:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.MessageRoles
member.summary: Provides constants for message roles.

member.name: F:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.MessageRoles.System
member.summary: System role - used for system instructions and context.

member.name: F:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.MessageRoles.User
member.summary: User role - represents messages from the user.

member.name: F:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.MessageRoles.Assistant
member.summary: Assistant role - represents responses from the AI assistant.

member.name: T:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionResponse
member.summary: Represents a successful response from the Mistral AI chat completion API.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionResponse.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the completion request.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionResponse.Object
member.summary: Gets or sets the object type. Always "chat.completion" for chat completions.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionResponse.Model
member.summary: Gets or sets the model identifier used for the completion.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionResponse.Created
member.summary: Gets or sets the timestamp when the completion was created (Unix timestamp).

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionResponse.Choices
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of completion choices generated by the model.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionResponse.Usage
member.summary: Gets or sets the token usage information for the request.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionResponse.GetFirstChoice
member.summary: Gets the first choice from the completion response.
member.returns: The first choice, or null if no choices are available.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionResponse.GetFirstChoiceContent
member.summary: Gets the content of the first choice message.
member.returns: The content of the first message, or empty string if not available.

member.name: T:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.UsageInfo
member.summary: Represents token usage information for a completion request.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.UsageInfo.PromptTokens
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of tokens in the prompt.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.UsageInfo.CompletionTokens
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of tokens in the completion.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.UsageInfo.TotalTokens
member.summary: Gets or sets the total number of tokens used (prompt + completion).

member.name: M:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.UsageInfo.GetEstimatedCost(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the total cost in USD based on the model and token usage.
member.param: The model used for the completion.
member.returns: The estimated cost in USD.

member.name: T:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionChoice
member.summary: Represents a single completion choice from the model.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionChoice.Index
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of this choice in the response.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionChoice.Message
member.summary: Gets or sets the message content for this choice.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionChoice.FinishReason
member.summary: Gets or sets the reason why the completion finished. Common values: "stop", "length", "content_filter".

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionChoice.LogProbs
member.summary: Gets or sets the log probability information for this choice (if requested).

member.name: T:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.MessageResponse
member.summary: Represents a message in the completion response.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.MessageResponse.Role
member.summary: Gets or sets the role of the message sender. For completions, this is typically "assistant".

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.MessageResponse.Content
member.summary: Gets or sets the content of the message. This is the actual text generated by the model.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.MessageResponse.ToolCalls
member.summary: Gets or sets the tool calls made by the model (if any). Used when the model decides to call functions.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.MessageResponse.Prefix
member.summary: Gets or sets whether this message is a prefix. Used in streaming responses.

member.name: T:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ToolCall
member.summary: Represents a tool call made by the model.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ToolCall.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for this tool call.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ToolCall.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of tool being called.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ToolCall.Function
member.summary: Gets or sets the function call details.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ToolCall.Index
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of this tool call in the sequence.

member.name: T:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.Function
member.summary: Represents a function call within a tool call.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.Function.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the function to call.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.Function.Arguments
member.summary: Gets or sets the arguments for the function call as a JSON string.

member.name: T:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.FinishReasons
member.summary: Provides constants for finish reasons.

member.name: F:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.FinishReasons.Stop
member.summary: The model reached a natural stopping point.

member.name: F:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.FinishReasons.Length
member.summary: The model reached the maximum token limit.

member.name: F:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.FinishReasons.ContentFilter
member.summary: The content was filtered due to safety concerns.

member.name: F:MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.FinishReasons.ToolCalls
member.summary: The model made a tool call.

member.name: T:MistralSDK.Configuration.MistralClientOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for the Mistral AI client.

member.name: F:MistralSDK.Configuration.MistralClientOptions.SectionName
member.summary: The default configuration section name in appsettings.json.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.Configuration.MistralClientOptions.ApiKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the API key for authentication with Mistral AI. This should be set via environment variables or secure configuration. Never commit API keys to source control.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.Configuration.MistralClientOptions.BaseUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the base URL for the Mistral AI API. Default is "https://api.mistral.ai/v1".

member.name: P:MistralSDK.Configuration.MistralClientOptions.TimeoutSeconds
member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout for HTTP requests in seconds. Default is 30 seconds.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.Configuration.MistralClientOptions.MaxRetries
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of retry attempts for transient failures. Default is 3.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.Configuration.MistralClientOptions.RetryDelayMilliseconds
member.summary: Gets or sets the initial delay in milliseconds between retry attempts. This value is used as the base for exponential backoff. Default is 1000 milliseconds (1 second).

member.name: P:MistralSDK.Configuration.MistralClientOptions.EnableCaching
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to enable request/response caching. Default is false.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.Configuration.MistralClientOptions.CacheExpirationMinutes
member.summary: Gets or sets the cache expiration time in minutes. Only used when is true. Default is 5 minutes.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.Configuration.MistralClientOptions.ThrowOnError
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to throw exceptions on API errors. When false, errors are returned in the response object. Default is false for backward compatibility.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.Configuration.MistralClientOptions.ValidateRequests
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to validate requests before sending. Default is true.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.Configuration.MistralClientOptions.Validate
member.summary: Validates the options and throws if invalid.
member.exception: Thrown when the options are invalid.

member.name: T:MistralSDK.Extensions.ServiceCollectionExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for configuring MistralSDK services in the dependency injection container.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.Extensions.ServiceCollectionExtensions.AddMistralClient(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.Action{MistralSDK.Configuration.MistralClientOptions})
member.summary: Adds the Mistral AI client to the service collection with the specified options.
member.param: An action to configure the client options.
member.returns: The service collection for chaining.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.Extensions.ServiceCollectionExtensions.AddMistralClient(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfigurationSection)
member.summary: Adds the Mistral AI client to the service collection with configuration from the specified section.
member.returns: The service collection for chaining.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.Extensions.ServiceCollectionExtensions.AddMistralClientFromEnvironment(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.String)
member.summary: Adds the Mistral AI client to the service collection with API key from environment variable.
member.param: The name of the environment variable containing the API key. Default is "MISTRAL_API_KEY".
member.returns: The service collection for chaining.
member.exception: Thrown when the environment variable is not set.

member.name: T:MistralSDK.MistralClient
member.summary: Client for interacting with the Mistral AI API. Provides methods to send chat completion requests and handle responses.

remarks.para: For production use, it is recommended to use to manage the lifecycle of HttpClient instances. This prevents socket exhaustion issues.
Use the class to configure the client behavior, including timeouts, retries, and caching.

member.name: F:MistralSDK.MistralClient.DefaultBaseUrl
member.summary: The default base URL for the Mistral AI API.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.MistralClient.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with an API key.
member.param: The API key for authentication with Mistral AI.
member.exception: Thrown when the API key is null, empty, or whitespace.
member.remarks: This constructor creates its own HttpClient instance. For better resource management in production applications, consider using the constructor that accepts an HttpClient from IHttpClientFactory.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.MistralClient.#ctor(MistralSDK.Configuration.MistralClientOptions)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with options.
member.param: The configuration options for the client.
member.exception: Thrown when the options are invalid.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.MistralClient.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Options.IOptions{MistralSDK.Configuration.MistralClientOptions})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with options (IOptions pattern).

member.name: M:MistralSDK.MistralClient.#ctor(System.Net.Http.HttpClient,MistralSDK.Configuration.MistralClientOptions)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a pre-configured HttpClient.
member.param: The HttpClient instance to use (typically from IHttpClientFactory).
The configuration options for the client.
member.exception: Thrown when httpClient or options is null.
member.remarks: Use this constructor with IHttpClientFactory for production applications. The HttpClient should be configured with the appropriate base address and authorization header.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.MistralClient.#ctor(System.Net.Http.HttpClient,Microsoft.Extensions.Options.IOptions{MistralSDK.Configuration.MistralClientOptions})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a pre-configured HttpClient (IOptions pattern).

member.name: M:MistralSDK.MistralClient.CreateJsonOptions
member.summary: Creates the JSON serializer options used for API communication.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.MistralClient.ValidateRequest(MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest)
member.summary: Validates a chat completion request without sending it to the API.
member.returns: A validation result indicating whether the request is valid.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.MistralClient.ChatCompletionAsync(MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest)
member.summary: Sends a chat completion request to the Mistral AI API.
member.param: The chat completion request containing the model, messages, and parameters.
member.returns: A object containing the API response or error information.
member.exception: Thrown when the request is null.
Thrown when the API returns an error (if ThrowOnError is enabled).

member.name: M:MistralSDK.MistralClient.ChatCompletionAsync(MistralSDK.ChatCompletion.ChatCompletionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sends a chat completion request to the Mistral AI API.
member.param: The chat completion request containing the model, messages, and parameters.
A cancellation token to cancel the operation.
member.returns: A object containing the API response or error information.
member.exception: Thrown when the request is null.
Thrown when request validation fails (if ValidateRequests is enabled).
Thrown when the API returns an error (if ThrowOnError is enabled).

member.name: M:MistralSDK.MistralClient.ParseResponse(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Parses the API response and creates a standardized object.
member.param: The HTTP status code from the API response.
The JSON response body from the API.
member.returns: A object with parsed content or error information.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.MistralClient.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: True to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:MistralSDK.MistralClient.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the .

member.name: T:MistralSDK.MistralResponse
member.summary: Represents a standardized response from the Mistral AI API.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.MistralResponse.StatusCode
member.summary: Gets or sets the HTTP status code of the response.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.MistralResponse.Message
member.summary: Gets or sets the message content from the API response. For successful requests, this contains the generated text. For errors, this contains the error message.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.MistralResponse.IsSuccess
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the request was successful.

member.name: P:MistralSDK.MistralResponse.Model
member.summary: Gets or sets the model used for the completion (only available for successful responses).

member.name: P:MistralSDK.MistralResponse.Usage
member.summary: Gets or sets the usage information from the API response (only available for successful responses).

member.name: M:MistralSDK.MistralResponse.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The HTTP status code of the response.
